page.title: 19My Home in Coulsdon
page.content: I live in a small, terraced house in Coulsdon. We have three smallish bedrooms. The largest bedroom belongs to my mum and dad, the next belongs to me and my sister, and the smallest is my brothers. He is 18, so he has a bedroom to himself. We have one television, a black and white portable which my mum keeps in her wardrobe. We hardly ever watch it anyway. Our kitchen is so small that only one person can go in there at a time. We eat our meals in our front room, which is our dining room as well. Our house is on an estate of about 60 houses, nearly all the same. The garden is only about the size of the biggest bedroom (rather small!).
